title: Enhancing Business Practical Competencies: Actor Network for Improving Live Online Education Efficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Identify at least three technical/human factors causing obstacles in online educational environments and propose improvement measures.
Visualize efficiency-influencing factors in mobile learning environments by applying Actor-Network Theory.
Develop at least two educational design improvement plans through interaction analysis among learners, instructors, and technology.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
